title: Week 5 Recap: Dak Prescott's Injury, Quinn and Dimitroff Fired, and COVID's Schedule Shake-up
description:
Nora and Kevin discuss the devastating ankle injury of Dak Prescott and what it means for the Cowboys going forward (02:41). Also, a major change in Atlanta with the firing of Dan Quinn and Thomas Dimitroff; Nora and Kevin break down what the Falcons can do to salvage an already rocky season opening (17:34). They also talk about the significant schedule changes due to COVID outbreaks across teams and the growing problem it's causing for the NFL (29:25). Lastly, they share their Winners and Losers (37:33).
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
